title: Snowed in with You
description: Steven always treated Becca like a little sister – no wonder, since he was her older brother’s best friend. While driving home for Christmas, a snowstorm hits and they’re stuck in a small town motel indefinitely. How can Becca prove to Steven that she’s all grown up now?A complete novelette-length love story: approximately 7,600 words.
author: Meredith Acker
